title: Portrait of a Gentleman
description: Portrait. Man dressed in red breeches and a blue velvet coat trimmed with gold braid and lined with crimson, is leaning with his left elbow on a column; dark blue tricorne in left hand; right hand on hip. He wears a white waistcoat and a white stock; frills at wrists. His slightly powdered hair is worn in a small peruke. Simple gold frame.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Mr. Eugene J. Carpenter
